descripcion: At present I am studying the Bachelor of Systems (UNLu). There I learned some of these technologies and tools but I have also incorporated knowledge through courses on various platforms and in a self-taught way.
3d modeling and rendering software accompanied me from the beginning of my studies and during the development of my profession as a Designer. Today they are a perfect complement to show my ideas.
I have experience in handling both, bitmap and vector images retouching software, logo generation, iconography, etc.
